obfuscation: Obviously, No-- inside course I ai n't, as well I will tell you, and i am governess see, and myself take care inside kiss for people and learn them things, governess be it; you must be smart surely, and but let 's not talk about me.
original: No--of course I ain't. Well, I'll tell you. I'm a governess, see? I take care of kids for people and learn them things. A governess, is it? You must be smart, surely. But let's not talk about me.

obfuscation: Tell me about the wreck like you promised me you would; yet 'T was this way Miss; and two weeks out our own serves ran into the civil 's own tornado and she sprang wan hell of a leak up for'ard.
original: Tell me about the wreck, like you promised me you would. 'Twas this way, Miss. Two weeks out we ran into the divil's own storm, and she sprang wan hell of a leak up for'ard.

obfuscation: The skipper be hoping to make Boston before another blow would finish her but − 10 days back we met up with another storm the like of the firstly only worse, yet four days our own serves was of it along green seas taking over her from bow to stern.
original: The skipper was hoping to make Boston before another blow would finish her, but ten days back we met up with another storm the like of the first, only worse. Four days we was in it with green seas raking over her from bow to stern.

obfuscation: Immediately, this was terrible time God help us; as also assuming that't be not for me also my great strength myself 'm telling you-- also it 's God 's truth-- there would been mutiny itself in the stokehole.
original: That was a terrible time, God help us. And if 'twasn't for me and my great strength, I'm telling you--and it's God's truth--there'd been mutiny itself in the stokehole.

obfuscation: 'T be me held them to it along kick to wan and clot to another and they not daring damn for engineers any more but fearing a clot in my right upper arm more than they would fear the sea itself.
original: 'Twas me held them to it, with a kick to wan and a clout to another, and they not caring a damn for the engineers any more, but fearing a clout of my right arm more than they'd fear the sea itself.

obfuscation: Next, You 've done some hard work did not you; and i did that; and myself 'm civil for sticking it out when them that 's weak give up; but much good it did anyone; and 'T be a mad fighting ' scramble inside last seconds with every man for himself.
original: You did some hard work, didn't you? I did that! I'm a divil for sticking it out when them that's weak give up. But much good it did anyone! 'Twas a mad, fightin' scramble in the last seconds with each man for himself.

obfuscation: myself disremember how it come about but there be the four inside us inside wan boat and when our own serves was raised high on great wave myself took a look about also civil a sight there be inside vessel or men on top inside sea.
original: I disremember how it come about, but there was the four of us in wan boat and when we was raised high on a great wave I took a look about and divil a sight there was of ship or men on top of the sea.

obfuscation: Then all the others was drowned; yet burke-- They was surely, as what terrible end, a terrible end for the like of them swabs does live on land perhaps, and but for the like of us does be roaming seas good end myself 'm telling you-- quick and lane.
original: Then all the others was drowned? BURKE--They was, surely. What a terrible end! A terrible end for the like of them swabs does live on land, maybe. But for the like of us does be roaming the seas, a good end, I'm telling you--quick and clane.

obfuscation: Yes clean; this 's must floor for-- all inside it-- way it 's driving me feel, and sea you mean; myself 'm thinking you have a bit inside it in your blood too.
original: Yes, clean. That's yust the word for--all of it--the way it makes me feel. The sea, you mean? I'm thinking you have a bit of it in your blood, too.

obfuscation: Your Old Man was not just barge rat-- begging your pardon-- all his lives by cut inside him, no he be bo'sun on sailing ships for years.
original: Your Old Man wasn't only a barge rat--begging your pardon--all his life, by the cut of him. No, he was bo'sun on sailing ships for years.

obfuscation: also all men on either side inside the family have gone to sea as far back as he remembers he says, all women have married sailors too; and did they right now; and they had spirit inside them; and it 's only on sea you had find pale men with guns is fit to wed with fine high-tempered girls the like in yourself.
original: And all the men on both sides of the family have gone to sea as far back as he remembers, he says. All the women have married sailors, too. Did they, now? They had spirit in them. It's only on the sea you'd find rale men with guts is fit to wed with fine, high-tempered girls the like of yourself.
